subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A goal by Ryan Getzlaf of the Anaheim Ducks midway through the third period gave Canada a 3-2 victory over Switzerland at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
snippet: A goal by Ryan Getzlaf of the Anaheim Ducks midway through the third period gave Canada a 3-2 victory over Switzerland at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
